They had a special agreement: every night at a fixed time, on a specific radio frequency, they would make simple contact via radio waves, sharing the day's events. After her loved one passed away, Grandma Wang was grief-stricken and unable to accept reality. A deep conviction formed in her heart that at their agreed-upon fixed time, on that specific frequency, a part of her son's 'existence' still existed in a way she could perceive, even if the radio only emitted hissing static.
tips: Grandma Wang has a son who has already passed away.
The radio was a communication tool she and her son had agreed upon in the past.
Her son was a radio enthusiast when he was alive.
Turning on the radio is a ritual to remember her son.
In reality, only static noise can be heard from the radio.
The smile comes from remembrance, the sigh from the sadness of reality.

title: Entering the Coffee Shop Again
surface: He walked into that coffee shop again, subconsciously wanting to escape, yet tears streamed down his face.
bottom: He was an underground worker. This coffee shop was his contact point. He would appear there on time every morning, making contact through different actions. Even after the war was won and he retired, this habit remained. To pay tribute to this war hero, people secretly prepared a surprise for him. When he walked into the coffee shop again, people hidden in the shop rushed out with their gifts. Years of agent experience made him subconsciously want to escape, but when he saw the gifts in people's hands, he was moved to tears.
tips: His true identity is an underground worker/agent.
The coffee shop was his secret contact point in the past.
He wanted to escape out of professional instinct, thinking he was ambushed.
The people in the shop were there to throw him a surprise party.
He is a respected war hero.
He was moved to tears by the people's kindness and tribute.

title: The Last Stab
surface: One stab, two stabs, three stabs... I plunged the last stab into his body, and his life ended.
bottom: Once there was a warm family. I was the servant of that family, silently guarding everything they had. That day, tragedy struck. The employer's only son was kidnapped and brutally murdered. The employer couple, upon hearing the devastating news, were heartbroken and eventually passed away one after another. However, the murderer remained at large, and no one could find his trace. For many years, I could not find peace in my heart. I, along with those who had received kindness from my employer, coincidentally embarked on the path of revenge. We finally found that cold-blooded killer. We gave him no chance to explain, nor did we choose to forgive him. To give everyone a chance to take revenge personally, and also to protect ourselves from murder charges, we decided that each person would stab him once to end his life. With years of anger and determination, I plunged the last stab into his body. I don't know if I was the one who ended his life, but this endless pursuit was over.
tips: This was a collective revenge action involving multiple people.
The deceased was the murderer who killed my former employer's son many years ago.
My former employer's entire family indirectly died because of this murderer.
The method of attack was for each avenger to stab only once.
'My' (the narrator's) identity is the former employer's family servant.
Part of the purpose of this act was to distribute blame, so the forensic examiner could not determine who inflicted the fatal wound.

title: Anger
surface: Watching his angry back, I could finally start doing what I wanted to do.
bottom: When I presented the groundbreaking discovery to my superior, he flew into a rage, sternly forbade me from continuing the research, and demanded that everything be sealed. But from his deliberately amplified anger and some subtle habitual actions that contradicted his anger, I saw through his disguise. I understood that this discovery was too sensitive, and he had to 'deny' it with the most intense posture to protect me and this laboratory. His seemingly decisive 'ban' actually cleared the obstacles for me. Under the guise that everyone thought I had stopped here, I gained the freedom to act secretly. Watching his angry back as he left, I knew clearly that he had, in this way, won me a precious opportunity to continue seeking the truth. Now, I can go find the key evidence that he secretly hoped I would find.
tips: 'He' and I have a superior-subordinate relationship.
His anger is a disguise, not his true emotion.
The real purpose of his feigned anger is to protect me.
I reported a sensitive and significant research finding to him.
His public 'ban' provided cover for me to secretly continue my research.
What I want to do is precisely what he expects me to secretly accomplish.

title: The Letter
surface: He gave me a letter and told me to open it only when I saw his name.
bottom: In our country, it has been a long time since anyone dared to speak loudly. The dictator's shadow was everywhere, informers lurked on every street corner, and the air itself seemed to reek of fear. We lived like the walking dead, merely seeking to survive. Until that day, my neighbor quietly knocked on my door. He handed me a letter and said, 'Keep this safe, and open it only when you see my name anywhere.' I watched him leave, filled with doubt, but didn't ask further. Two days later, the whole country was in an uproar. News spread like wildfire: the dictator had been assassinated during a public appearance. The identity of the assassin was exposed, and his name blazed before my eyes – it was my neighbor. Trembling, I opened the letter. There was only one line, written in a firm and powerful hand: 'Please believe, even the darkest night will welcome the dawn.'
tips: The story is set in a repressive dictatorial country.
'He' is my neighbor, and also a revolutionary.
He planned and carried out the assassination of the dictator.
The occasion to 'see his name' was when he was exposed as the assassin in the news.
He had long been prepared for self-sacrifice.
The content of the letter is a last message conveying hope.

title: Lost Child
surface: 'Thank you for finding my lost child. I'm taking him home now.' This was the last sentence I heard.
bottom: Having recently lost my child, I was walking down the road in a daze when I was suddenly drawn by the sound of crying. I found a small child whose clothes and the nursery rhyme he was singing were strikingly similar to my deceased son's. This made me lower my guard, and I resolved to help him. The child led me to a riverside, where I saw a pale-faced woman with empty eyes appear. The woman thanked me, saying, 'Thank you for finding my lost child. I'm taking him home now,' but then, when I wasn't looking, she pushed me into the river and drowned me. In my pain, I learned that the child was indeed the woman's son, who had drowned while playing in the river. His body and soul were held by an evil spirit in the river. To get her child's body back, the woman agreed to lure another victim for the evil spirit. Now, the woman was taking her child home.
tips: I was dazed and easily deceived due to the recent loss of my child.
The 'lost child' was actually the woman's deceased son (his ghost).
I was ultimately pushed into the river and drowned by the woman.
The woman had made a deal with an evil spirit in the river.
The deal was to exchange my life for her child's soul/body.
The woman's child had also previously drowned in this same river.

title: Reunion After Ten Years
surface: Ten years later, I received news of him again. I saw him once more, my heart filled with mixed emotions.
bottom: Ever since that murderer escaped from me ten years ago, I never gave up chasing him. This time, I finally got a definite clue. When I finally found him, living under a new name in a remote small town, what I saw was a cold corpse. Just a day before, he had drowned in a swift current while trying to save a girl who had fallen into the water. The murderer I had pursued for ten years ended his life before me as a hero. Looking at the crying girl, listening to the bystanders praising his heroic deed, my heart was filled with mixed emotions, unsure how to place this long-overdue 'justice.'
tips: 'He' is a murderer who has been on the run for ten years.
'I' (the narrator) am the person who has been pursuing him for ten years.
When I 'saw him' again, he was already a corpse.
He died saving a drowning girl, passing away as a hero.
He had been living under an assumed name during his time on the run.
The mixed emotions stem from the fact that the pursued murderer ultimately died in a heroic manner.

title: Repaying Kindness with Enmity
surface: I failed to do what I promised, so I had to repay kindness with enmity in front of everyone.
bottom: My five co-workers and I were trapped deep in the desert, with food and water almost depleted. So they made a difficult decision: to give me the remaining hope – most of the water – and let me go out to seek help. Carrying their trust and the desire to live, I stumbled forward for two days and two nights, finally making contact with the outside world. However, the boss pretended to reassure me that he would take action quickly, but in reality, he refused to search and rescue to evade responsibility. He even publicly claimed that I escaped on my own and widely publicized it as a result of the company's 'advanced management.' I naively believed the boss's words and only learned the truth a week later, by which time my friends had no chance of survival. At the press conference, the boss, surrounded by reporters, spoke eloquently, glibly whitewashing the situation. All the anger, despair, and guilt erupted in an instant. I rushed forward, grabbed the fruit knife from the table, and stabbed that detestable face. Blood stained the entire press conference scene.
tips: I carried the hopes of several co-workers for rescue.
The co-workers ultimately were not rescued and died.
The boss was the key person who obstructed the rescue and distorted the facts.
The boss made the public believe he had done me a favor.
The 'repaying kindness with enmity' happened at the press conference.
My 'revenge' target was the boss who deceived me.
My actions stemmed from anger towards the boss and guilt towards the co-workers.

title: Family Heirloom
surface: This 'family heirloom,' after all, ended in my hands.
bottom: I knew that the widely rumored murderer in town was my father; my grandfather's past abuse towards him had twisted his personality. And I, too, had not escaped his clutches. In this oppressive family atmosphere, the evil thought of murder had been growing in my heart. Finally, after a fierce conflict, the long-suppressed anger, fear, and despair burst forth like a raging flood. I lost control and stabbed my father with a knife. Watching him fall, I was overcome with a mixture of grief and fear. I quickly wrote a suicide note, pouring out this twisted past, my father's crimes, and my inner struggles onto it. Then, I raised a gun and killed myself, hoping to end this evil legacy with my life.
tips: 'Family heirloom' refers to the intergenerational transmission of violence or criminal tendencies in the family.
The father's violent behavior stemmed from the abuse he suffered in childhood.
I was also a victim of my father's abuse.
I eventually killed my father.
After killing my father, I also chose to commit suicide.
My suicide was to completely end this family's evil legacy.

title: Small Yellow Croaker
surface: The small yellow croaker in the seafood market looks bright and beautiful, as if boasting its delicacy. After the fishmonger, Old Zhou, mysteriously disappeared, the harbor surveillance captured hundreds of glowing red fish swimming towards the deep sea.
bottom: Old Zhou's fish business seemed prosperous on the surface. However, the beauty of the small yellow croaker was achieved through the use of industrial dyes. These dyes caused significant damage to the marine ecosystem, polluting the water and distorting the natural colors of the fish. Since no one stopped the misuse of dyes in time, the accumulated resentment from the polluted sea led the fish to silently approach Old Zhou's boat. A swarm of vengeful fish capsized his boat and pushed him into the deep sea.
tips: The small yellow croaker looks unnaturally bright
Old Zhou sold dyed fish
The dye polluted the water and ecosystem
The vengeful fish attacked Old Zhou
Surveillance captured glowing red fish

title: Spider
surface: I lived a peaceful life in a luxurious villa. However, one day, my villa was completely destroyed, and I was brutally killed.
bottom: I am a spider, and my villa was the large and exquisite spider web I carefully spun in the corner of the villa. In my eyes, it was the perfect home. However, for the villa's owner, this conspicuous spider web ruined the tidiness. So the owner destroyed it with a broom and other tools, and in the panic, I was swatted to death by the owner.
tips: The spider spun a large web in the villa
The spider considered the web a perfect home
The owner thought the web ruined the tidiness
The owner destroyed the web with a broom and killed the spider
The spider was swatted to death

title: Sewage
surface: There is a chemical plant in the village, and this year it has become extremely popular.
bottom: The factory continuously discharged sewage into the village's river, which emitted a large amount of hydrogen sulfide gas (highly flammable and explosive). On New Year's Day, when villagers set off firecrackers by the river, the fire interacted with the flammable gas, causing a severe fire. The chemical plant's popularity was due to the many deaths, as blood flowed into the river.
tips: The chemical plant polluted the river with sewage
The sewage contained flammable hydrogen sulfide gas
Villagers setting off firecrackers by the river caused a fire
The fire resulted in severe casualties
The plant's red color was dyed by blood

title: In Vain
surface: On Mother's Day, I wanted to make a unique gift for my mother. I made a flower wreath and prepared her favorite fruits. But when the gift was ready, my mother cried in sorrow.
bottom: On Mother's Day, I hadn't seen my mother for a long time, so I decided to walk to town to surprise her. However, I didn't have enough money for a taxi, but I remembered the way. I just needed to follow the main road. Along the way, I was filled with joy, admiring the scenery. Seeing beautiful flowers, I thought they must be what my mother liked, so I picked them to weave into a flower wreath. When I saw the fruits my mother had mentioned before, I picked them, thinking she would be delighted to taste them. But due to my carelessness, I fell while picking the fruit and hit my head on a stone. In the wilderness, no one discovered my bleeding. I fell into a hallucination, seeing my mother welcoming me with a surprised and happy face, wearing the flower wreath I made and eating the fruits I picked, filling my heart with happiness. That night, my grandfather informed my mother of my disappearance. With the help of the police, my mother saw my body.
tips: Made a flower wreath and prepared fruits for mother
Walked to town to surprise mother
Fell and hit head while picking fruit
Bled to death in the wilderness without being noticed
Mother saw my body in the end

title: Neighbor
surface: I built a wall, and the next day I had a scar on my face.
bottom: My neighbor was very fond of taking small advantages. There had been a long-term dispute between our two families over land ownership. To reduce contact with my neighbors, I blocked the public passage left in my home. However, my neighbors felt that what I did affected their passage and thought I was targeting them. So they designed to tie kite strings at my doorstep. When I came home and didn't notice the kite string, I normally drove my motorcycle into the courtyard. Unexpectedly, the kite string cut half of my face.
tips: I blocked the public passage
The neighbor thought I was targeting them
The neighbor retaliated with kite strings
I didn't notice the kite string when I came home
The kite string cut my face

title: Terrifying Picture Book
surface: Above the colorful sea of flowers, a girl in a white dress dances among a swarm of butterflies. She has fair skin and raven-black hair, captivating everyone who sees her. In the same sea of flowers, a girl with a light yellow dress and dark-brown skin mechanically imitates the other girl.
bottom: The man was a biologist who enjoyed collecting various animal specimens for observation. To facilitate his specimen collection, he owned an entire mountain of private flower gardens. During one specimen collection, he met a girl who had mistakenly wandered into his garden. From the first glance, he fell deeply in love with her. However, after a series of intense pursuits, the girl remained indifferent. So the man, in order to keep the girl, knocked her unconscious, immersed her in formaldehyde, and turned her into a human specimen. The girl's dress and skin changed color under the liquid. The man then obsessively posed her in the initial posture and placed her in the flower garden.
tips: The man was a biologist collecting specimens
The man fell in love with the girl who wandered in
The girl rejected the man's advances
The man immersed the girl in formaldehyde
The girl became a human specimen displayed in the garden

title: Karma
surface: Today is the wedding day, and everyone is comforting me. When I see her, the bag of gold has found its place.
bottom: On the wedding day, it was raining. Two wedding processions met on the way and had to take shelter in a pavilion. While waiting, the two brides started talking. Bride A couldn't help but cry, complaining that she was marrying a poor husband and that the wedding day was so unlucky (it was raining), which made her cry. Bride B, seeing this, felt very sympathetic and gave her a bag of gold, hoping she could use the money to improve her life. Others, seeing Bride A's situation, could only offer sympathy, but when they saw Bride A receive help, they also congratulated her on meeting a kind-hearted person. However, not long after, Bride B's home was robbed by bandits, and her family fell into poverty. To make a living, Bride B had to work as a wet nurse for a wealthy family. One day, while taking care of the young master, Bride B accidentally found a sachet in the young master's room, which was the same one she had given to Bride A to hold the gold. Only then did Bride B realize that the person she had helped had become her mistress. When Bride A found out, she was very moved and decided to take good care of Bride B in return for her kindness.
tips: Bride A used the gold to improve her situation
Bride B gave the gold out of sympathy
Bride B's home was robbed by bandits
Bride A became wealthy with the gold
Bride B found the sachet in the young master's room

title: Secrets of the Mansion
surface: At night, the quiet corridor echoed with hurried footsteps. The next day, a boat slowly sank on the river. People on the shore used a chain to pull up the boat. On the second day, the boat sank again, but this time there was no one on the shore.
bottom: In the mansion, the head of the household immediately rushed to the backyard after receiving news of the eldest madam's adultery. The next day, the lover was being drowned in the pond, but the eldest madam was untouchable. At the critical moment, the lover shouted, 'I can help the head of the household cure infertility!' Overjoyed, the head of the household pulled him up. That night, the eldest madam advised the lover to escape while he had the chance, but the lover was not content. He said, 'His wealth and status are all due to your family's power. We just need to find an opportunity to kill him, and we won't have to hide anymore.' Thus, he harbored murderous intentions. However, the eldest madam, who appeared to agree, was actually very sensible and knew that such a malicious person could never be kept. The next day, she told the head of the household about it. On the second day, the lover was drowned in the pond again.
tips: The eldest madam committed adultery, and the lover was drowned
The lover promised to cure infertility
The lover plotted to kill
The eldest madam was very calculating
The lover was drowned again

title: Miao
surface: Miao disappeared for a long time. When I saw him again, he was no longer the same.
bottom: My cat Miao didn't come back for a long time after going out once. Just as I felt hopeless about finding him, I found Miao sitting obediently at the doorstep. But I always felt that he was different from before. However, I didn't think much about it, just thinking that he might have matured after going out and experiencing some things. It wasn't until today, when I was giving the cat a bath, that I was surprised to find that this cat had marks on its feet that were different from Miao's. I guess Miao must have entrusted its offspring to me, but it can never come back.
tips: Miao disappeared and came back
Miao seemed different
The cat had different marks on its feet
Miao entrusted its offspring to me
Miao can never come back

title: Deadly Jade
surface: The wealthy man went to the temple to worship every day, and the abbot gave him a Guanyin statue as a token of gratitude. Soon after, both the wealthy man and the monk met their end.
bottom: The wealthy man, who appeared to be a prominent philanthropist, had an unclean source of wealth. In an attempt to launder his ill-gotten gains, he decided to donate a large sum of money to the temple for renovation. The monk, originally a devout practitioner, gradually fell into the abyss of greed as the wealthy man's 'donations' became more frequent. He then demanded a high 'hush money' payment from the wealthy man. However, the wealthy man did not comply with the monk's demands and instead became increasingly furious. In order to protect his reputation and wealth, the wealthy man decided to go to any lengths to silence the monk. During a face-to-face meeting, the wealthy man, in a fit of anger, decided to take extreme measures. On one hand, he pretended to agree to pay more bribes, while on the other hand, he secretly arranged for his men to deal with the monk. The wealthy man thought he could kill two birds with one stone: continue to cover up his crimes and eliminate the monk's threat. However, what the wealthy man did not know was that the monk also wanted to kill two birds with one stone. Knowing that if left unchecked, the wealthy man would eventually kill him as well, the monk had already secretly handed over evidence of the wealthy man's money laundering to the public security department. On the night the wealthy man sent his men to kill the monk, the police had already locked onto the wealthy man and his criminal network. The monk did not escape assassination. The wealthy man's assets were all frozen, his reputation was ruined, and he ultimately ended up in prison.

title: Karma
surface: At the age of 9, I was playing basketball with Xiao Zhuo when suddenly hail began to fall. He was upset. That night, Xiao Zhuo played with his dog but was still upset. At the age of 16, my parents were very sad. I shouldn’t have treated my son this way. I comforted them. At the age of 23, I sent my parents many flowers so they wouldn’t feel too lonely. At 25, hail fell again, just like it did in my memories.
bottom: At the age of 9, I broke someone’s window, and the shards of glass scattered everywhere like hail. The owner came to demand compensation, and since my family was poor, I asked Xiao Zhuo to take the blame for me, and his father helped pay the money. However, Xiao Zhuo’s family was very strict, and they immediately kicked him out of the house, saying they couldn’t tolerate a son like him. After being kicked out, Xiao Zhuo wanted to come sleep at my house. But on his way, the road was dark and isolated, and he was attacked by hungry wild dogs, which led to his tragic death. At 16, I couldn’t bear the inner turmoil, so I went to visit his parents and explained everything to them. I found that for years, they had been living with guilt and regret. To ease their guilt, I began regularly visiting them on behalf of Xiao Zhuo. At 23, I started working, and Xiao Zhuo’s parents said, 'You’ve been busy with work lately. You don’t need to visit us so often.' I understood what they meant, so I decided to send them flowers often to help alleviate their sadness. At 25, as I was buying flowers for them, I suddenly heard the sound of a car crashing, followed by the shattering of car windows. The cars on the road had crashed, and one of them hit me. The person at fault avoided responsibility, delaying the police investigation. Due to lack of funds for medical treatment, I could not get surgery in time, leaving me permanently disabled.

From then on, though I lost him, he will forever accompany me. I kept his brain and used electronic devices to continue supporting it, placing the brain in the secret base operating table. Through cameras, it sent images to the brain, allowing it to see what I did to other online friends. Every time I saw a sharp fluctuation in the device, I knew that he must have liked my gift.
